description: Numbered stops in Manhattan on the Lexington Avenue subway.
comments: These are the numbered stops for the #6 train.
references: An Adventurer's Guide to Number Theory by R. Friedberg, 1968, McGraw-Hill, p. 30 (corrected).
links: R. K. Guy, Letters to N. J. A. Sloane, June-August 1968
author: _Howard Givner_
extensions: Additional comments from Nyck Byrd (nyc10024(AT)lycos.com), Dec 25 2005
